segments.text: I notice the woman is polishing a plate, she seems really focused on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just overflowing, it's such a waste of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is being so daring, climbing up on that stool like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting patiently for her cookie, she must really want one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the garden outside through the window, it's so well-maintained and peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is in such disarray with the overflowing sink and the children climbing on stools, it's a shame.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over, someone should really help that boy before he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing in the puddle of water, she must be so focused on drying that plate that she doesn't notice anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes are stacked neatly on the counter, at least someone has been keeping things organized and tidy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice the children taking cookies without permission soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is almost full to the brim, they must have baked a lot of cookies recently.
segments.speaker: PAR
